summary: Clapper only said he wasn't aware of an investigation.

statements.quote: When James Clapper himself, and virtually everyone else with knowledge of the witch hunt, says there is no collusion, when does it end?
Director Clapper reiterated what everybody, including the fake media already knows- there is "no evidence" of collusion w/ Russia and Trump.

name: James Clapper confirmed there is no evidence of Russia/Trump collusion
